section.title: Multi-host deployments
section.p: Best results are achieved in production deployments that include one master host and two or more delegate hosts. In this configuration, the master host runs in its own, separate resource pool, and runs only internal services. Delegate hosts run application services. The following table lists minimum resource requirements for the master host. Delegate hosts have additional requirements.

section.p: In a single-host deployment, the master host runs all internal services and all application services. The following table lists minimum resource requirements for the master host. Actual CPU and RAM requirements depend on the application load.
